Container.Name: deepstack
Container.Overview: [p][span style="color: #777;"]DeepStack is an AI server that empowers every developer in the world to easily build state-of-the-art AI systems both on-premise and in the cloud. The promises of Artificial Intelligence are huge but becoming a machine learning engineer is hard. Build and deploy AI-powered applications with in-built and custom AI APIs, all offline and self-hosted. See https://deepstack.cc[br/][br/]To use with Home Assistant see [span style="color: #008080;"][a style="color: #008080;" href="https://github.com/robmarkcole/HASS-Deepstack-object#hass-deepstack-object"]here[/a][/span][br/][br/][b]Old CPUs without AVX[/b][br/]If you are using an older CPU that doesn't support AVX add [b]:noavx[/b] to the end of the [b]"Repository:"[/b] field.[br/]Should look like this: [b]deepquestai/deepstack:noavx[/b][br/][br/][b]Nvidia GPU Use[/b][br/]Install Unraid Nvidia Plugin to install Nvidia Drivers.[br/]Add [b]:gpu[/b] to the end of the [b]"Repository:"[/b] field. Should look like this: [b]deepquestai/deepstack:gpu[/b][br/]Add [b]--runtime=nvidia[/b] to the [b]"Extra Parameters:"[/b] field (switch on advanced view) .[br/]Copy your [b]GPU UUID[/b] to [b]NVIDIA_VISIBLE_DEVICES.[/b][/span][/p]

Config.Name: Object Detection
Config.Description: This enables the object detection API. Default is False.

Config.Name: Face Detection
Config.Description: This enables the face recognition APIs. Default is False.

Config.Name: Scene Detection
Config.Description: This enables the scene recognition API. Default is False.

Config.Name: Performance Mode
Config.Description: DeepStack offers three modes allowing you to tradeoff speed for performance. You can specify performance mode to be High, Medium and Low. Default is Medium.

Config.Name: PUID
Config.Description: UID for permissions. Do not change unless you know what you're doing.

Config.Name: PGID
Config.Description: GID for permissions. Do not change unless you know what you're doing.
